ComicInfo.Title: Chaos Theory: Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: U.S. on sale date: 2011-08-10. barcode is written as such on here to distinguish between printings:12 digits, followed by a dash, with 5 more digits to indicate what issue and version (e.g.- 02311- issue 23, 1st print; 02312- issue 23, 2nd print; 02321- issue 23, variant cover).Chaos Theory: Part 2: Optimus Prime faces off vs. some renegade autobots who attempt to free Whirl after he was arested for attacking Megatron last issue (#22). They fail, and Optimus then confronts the Autobot senate and tells them of the corruption in their ranks as known by Megatron. He's later confronted by a sneator outside and told he's right, that a war's coming, and to be ready for it.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev36 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-03-22 17:23:32. [Issue ID 869485]
